title: Kannurangu Lyrics Tamil Album Song By SathyaPrakash
stanzas:
Aayiram Vaarthaigal
thondruthe annaiye
thyaagame ondruthaan
varthaiye annaiye

sandhana maalaiyai
vaangithaan poduven.
naan oindha megame
nee pinbu ootinaai
neethaan en vazhkaiye
urakkam kolluvaai.

aariro araariro
en annaiye ne kannurangu.
boomiyai unathaakave
magan irukkiran
nee kannurangu. (2)

aari raariro
thaari aari
raari raariro

irunda un aaniver
irundhum naan vazhave
unai nee maatri
maari vazha thodanginai

karuvarai naalile
sumandha en dheivame
ingu neeyum naanum
vazhvu vazha vendinaai.

thiyagiyaagi maarinaai
naan oindha megame
nee pinbu ootinaai
neethaan en vazhkaiye
urakkam kolluvaai.

aariro araariro
en annaiye ne kannurangu.
boomiyai unathaakave
magan irukkiran
nee kannurangu. (2)
